text.0: In a trial comparing rivaroxaban with dose-adjusted warfarin, rivaroxaban was noninferior to warfarin with respect to the mean time until the primary outcome of death, major cardiovascular events, or major bleeding at 12 months. #AHA20
text.1: Dr. John A. Jarcho, Deputy Editor of The New England Journal of Medicine discusses the Galactic-HF Trial. This was a trial of a novel heart failure drug Omecamtiv Mecarbil. #AHA20
text.2: When an adolescent psychiatrist interviews parents of Black boys, he comes away with similar narratives — a story in which normative behavior is characterized with behaviors classically associated with common diagnoses are misattributed.
text.3: Dr. John A. Jarcho, Deputy Editor of The New England Journal of Medicine discusses Tips-3 Trial, a clinical trial of a polypill in 5,713 patients without cardiovascular disease, who are at increased cardiovascular risk. #AHA20
text.4: The daily #COVID19 hospitalization rate in the United Kingdom is back where it was at the start of the lockdown on March 23. The exhausted National Health Service workforce will be asked to step up again, and the NHS will again be repurposed as a Covid service. #SARSCoV2
